snippet.title: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The all-time classic "Dead Rising" is being brought back to life and beyond in Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster with 4K high fidelity graphics, 3D audio support, voiceover in nine different languages, an auto-save feature, and various quality of life changes for improved playability!

Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster launches digitally on PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam on September 19th, 2024.

https://twitter.com/DeadRising
https://www.deadrising.com/1/en-us/
